info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 7:17PM EDT until August 21 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of south central Georgia, including the following counties, Tift, Turner and Worth.
* WHEN...Until 1030 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 717 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sylvester, Ashburn, Poulan, Ty Ty, Worth, Terrell, Sycamore, Sumner, Shingler, Coverdale, Isabella, Hobby, Gammage, Tempy, Gordy, Powelltown, Turner Co Airport, Scooterville and Anderson City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EDT THIS EVENING

area.areaDesc: Tift, GA; Turner, GA; Worth, GA
